verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD אַחַ֣ר ׀ <S%H310><s%> after שַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> had let him go אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֛ן <S%H5018><s%> that Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָֽרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> from Ramah בְּקַחְתּ֣וֹ <S%H3947><s%> when he had taken אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> him אָס֤וּר <S%H631><s%> him being bound בָּֽאזִקִּים֙ <S%H246><s%> in chains בְּת֨וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גָּל֤וּת <S%H1546><s%> all that were carried away captive יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah הַמֻּגְלִ֖ים <S%H1540><s%> which were carried away captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> unto Babylon

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> And the captain טַבָּחִ֖ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard לְיִרְמְיָ֑הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> against יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God דִּבֶּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> hath pronounced אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> this evil הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> upon this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> hath brought וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> [it] and done יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Now the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> according as he hath said כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חֲטָאתֶ֤ם <S%H2398><s%> because ye have sinned לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> and did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8085><s%> and have not obeyed בְּקוֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> has happened לָכֶ֖ם [דָּבָר כ] (הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> act ק) הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> now הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> behold פִתַּחְתִּ֣יךָ <S%H6605><s%> And now behold I loose הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> thee this day מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הָאזִקִּים֮ <S%H246><s%> from the chains אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> after יָדֶךָ֒ <S%H3027><s%> which [were] upon thine hand אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If ט֨וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good בְּעֵינֶ֜יךָ <S%H5869><s%> affliction לָב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> unto thee to come אִתִּ֣י <S%H854><s%> for בָבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> with me into Babylon בֹּ֚א <S%H935><s%> come וְאָשִׂ֤ים <S%H7760><s%> appoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינִי֙ <S%H5869><s%> affliction עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> after וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if רַ֧ע <S%H7489><s%> afflict בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <S%H5869><s%> affliction לָבֽוֹא־ <S%H935><s%> unto thee to come אִתִּ֥י <S%H854><s%> for בָבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> with me into Babylon חֲדָ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> forbear רְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> behold כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the land לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> [is] before אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> thee whither it seemeth ט֨וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַיָּשָׁ֧ר <S%H3477><s%> right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <S%H5869><s%> affliction לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> go שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> wherever לֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> to go

וְעוֹדֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was still לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָשׁ֗וּב <S%H7725><s%> Now while he was not yet gone back וְשֻׁ֡בָה <S%H7725><s%> [he said] Go back אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> then גְּדַלְיָ֣ה <S%H1436><s%> also to Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֣ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָ֡ן <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הִפְקִ֨יד <S%H6485><s%> hath made governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> whom the king בָּבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> over the cities יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְשֵׁ֤ב <S%H3427><s%> and dwell אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> for בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> with him among הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people א֠וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> anywhere הַיָּשָׁ֧ר <S%H3477><s%> right בְּעֵינֶ֛יךָ <S%H5869><s%> affliction לָלֶ֖כֶת <S%H1980><s%> go לֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> to go וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> gave ל֧וֹ רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> So the captain טַבָּחִ֛ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard אֲרֻחָ֥ה <S%H737><s%> him victuals וּמַשְׂאֵ֖ת <S%H4864><s%> and a reward וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7971><s%> and let him go

וַיָּבֹ֧א <S%H935><s%> Then went יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּדַלְיָ֥ה <S%H1436><s%> unto Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4708><s%> to Mizpah וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt אִתּוֹ֙ <S%H854><s%> for בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> with him among הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <S%H7604><s%> that were left בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land ס

וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ֩ <S%H8085><s%> heard כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> now all שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> Now when all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֜ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> which [were] in the fields הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they וְאַנְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H376><s%> and their men כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִפְקִ֧יד <S%H6485><s%> governor מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> that the king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדַלְיָ֥הוּ <S%H1436><s%> had made Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֖ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וְכִ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for הִפְקִ֣יד <S%H6485><s%> and had committed אִתּ֗וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> of the men וְנָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> and women וָטָ֔ף <S%H2945><s%> and children וּמִדַּלַּ֣ת <S%H1803><s%> and of the poor הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not הָגְל֖וּ <S%H1540><s%> of them that were not carried away captive בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> to Babylon

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> Then they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּדַלְיָ֖ה <S%H1436><s%> to Gedaliah הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4708><s%> to Mizpah וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <S%H3458><s%> even Ishmael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נְתַנְיָ֡הוּ <S%H5418><s%> of Nethaniah וְיוֹחָנָ֣ן <S%H3110><s%> and Johanan וְיוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3129><s%> and Jonathan בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the sons קָ֠רֵחַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וּשְׂרָיָ֨ה <S%H8304><s%> and Seraiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son תַּנְחֻ֜מֶת <S%H8576><s%> of Tanhumeth וּבְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons [עֹופַי כ] (עֵיפַ֣י <S%H5778><s%> Ephai ק) הַנְּטֹפָתִ֗י <S%H5200><s%> the Netophathite וִֽיזַנְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3153><s%> and Jezaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הַמַּ֣עֲכָתִ֔י <S%H4602><s%> of a Maachathite הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they וְאַנְשֵׁיהֶֽם׃ <S%H582><s%> they and their men

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> sware לָהֶ֜ם גְּדַלְיָ֨הוּ <S%H1436><s%> And Gedaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֤ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָן֙ <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan וּלְאַנְשֵׁיהֶ֣ם <S%H376><s%> their men לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <S%H3372><s%> Fear מֵעֲב֣וֹד <S%H5647><s%> not to serve הַכַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> the Chaldeans שְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> dwell in בָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְעִבְד֛וּ <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְיִיטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> and it shall be well לָכֶֽם׃

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> I הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> I am going יֹשֵׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> As for me behold I will dwell בַּמִּצְפָּ֔ה <S%H4709><s%> at Mizpah לַֽעֲמֹד֙ <S%H5975><s%> to stand לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יָבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> which will come אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H413><s%> about וְאַתֶּ֡ם <S%H859><s%> you אִסְפוּ֩ <S%H622><s%> unto us but ye gather יַ֨יִן <S%H3196><s%> ye wine וְקַ֜יִץ <S%H7019><s%> and summer fruits וְשֶׁ֗מֶן <S%H8081><s%> and oil וְשִׂ֙מוּ֙ <S%H7760><s%> and put בִּכְלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3627><s%> [them] in your vessels וּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> and dwell בְּעָרֵיכֶ֥ם <S%H5892><s%> in your cities אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who תְּפַשְׂתֶּֽם׃ <S%H8610><s%> that ye have taken

וְגַ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְּהוּדִ֡ים <S%H3064><s%> Likewise when all the Jews אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּמוֹאָ֣ב ׀ <S%H4124><s%> that [were] in Moab וּבִבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַמּ֨וֹן <S%H5983><s%> and among the Ammonites וּבֶאֱד֜וֹם <S%H123><s%> and in Edom וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and who בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֲרָצוֹת֙ <S%H776><s%> and that [were] in all the countries שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> had left מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> that the king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> a remnant לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְכִי֙ <S%H3588><s%> for הִפְקִ֣יד <S%H6485><s%> and that he had set עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H1436><s%> over them Gedaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחִיקָ֥ם <S%H296><s%> of Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שָׁפָֽן׃ <S%H8227><s%> of Shaphan

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> returned out כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְּהוּדִ֗ים <S%H3064><s%> Even all the Jews מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמְּקֹמוֹת֙ <S%H4725><s%> of all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> to which נִדְּחוּ־ <S%H5080><s%> whither they were driven שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> to the land יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H1436><s%> to Gedaliah הַמִּצְפָּ֑תָה <S%H4708><s%> unto Mizpah וַיַּאַסְפ֛וּ <S%H622><s%> and gathered יַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וָקַ֖יִץ <S%H7019><s%> and summer fruits הַרְבֵּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> much מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> very פ

וְיֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> Moreover Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קָרֵ֔חַ <S%H7143><s%> of Kareah וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and all the captains הַחֲיָלִ֖ים <S%H2428><s%> of the forces אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> were בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> that [were] in the fields בָּ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּדַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H1436><s%> to Gedaliah הַמִּצְפָּֽתָה׃ <S%H4708><s%> to Mizpah
